item.title: Site Recovery Manager (SRM) Update 1 released
item.description: SRM 1.0 Update 1 has the following new features: New Permission Required to Run a Recovery Plan SRM now distinguishes between permission to test a recovery plan and permission to run a recovery plan. After an SRM server is updated to this release, existing users of that server who had permission to run a recovery plan no longer have that permission. You must grant Run permission to these users after the update is complete.
